TopicTitle: Can I disable this right click mouse view change?

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I'm sure for a lot of people this new right click view is a feature, but for someone trying to repeatedly right click on precisenode, it's a huge pain.
Yes. Go to the settings menu, there's a checkbox for it. :)
Thanks a tonne, but could I ask for specifics? I've spent half an hour searching that menu :p

Hit "escape" while you're playing, there's a little menu that comes up.  Click "settings".  There's a simple dialog box that pops up and down near the bottom is a checkbox for the mouselook feature.  Sorry, I'm not in front of my game computer right now so I don't remember the exact text on the checkbox, but I recall that it's pretty easy to find.

Main thing is that it's in the in-game settings popup dialog (the little simple one), not the big complicated main settings thingy from the start menu.

Specific name for that setting is called "Double Click Mouse Look".

You can disable it either main menu settings under general tab or in game settings under gameplay tab.

Just untick that checkbox and it should be disabled
